page.title: 13Ecology of Retford
page.content: The{mammals}live in,under and on buildings.Common ones we have found; stoats,weasels,bats,dogs &cats,foxes and badgers,rabbits & hares. Common{reptiles &amphibians}we have found;frogs,toads,newts,lizards,snakes ,slow worms. Common{birds}we have found; Swallows,Kestrels,Sparrows,Black birds,Crows,Thrushes,Pidgeons,Lapwings ,Seagulls,Mallards,Moorhens,Sand Pipers,Swans,House Martins,Wrens. You can see most of these animals in Retford or the surrounding area.The {canal}is a good place to see everything.It provides a perfect{range {of habitat}for all types of animals. We do our bit to conserve these animals by hiding them when we find them.We tell people not to take animals from their{natural habitat.}
